name: Skwirmy
description:
Skwirmy is a fun, fast-paced, 2D top-down action game filled with squishy, skittering creatures.

Nothing in Skwirmy's world is considered inedible! Skwirmy is always hungry and there is no limit to how big he can grow, given enough to eat.

Skwirmy can eat bugs piece by piece or even bite them in half, making one meal into two.

Your goal is to score as many points as you can, grow Skwirmy as long as you can, and, of course, stay alive.

FEATURES:

  • Fast, smooth character movement controlled by your phone's accelerometer.
  • High-score board + a comparison of your score to the player with the next highest score above you displayed after every game.
  • Bug-squishing, satisfying fun!
  • Free version with ads also available under the name "Skwirmy Free"
